scripts.lint: npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint
scripts.clean: npm run clean:buildinfo && npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:bin && npm run clean:rel
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:dist && npm run build:exe
scripts.build:sea: npm run build:sea:blob && npm run build:sea:cpnode && npm run build:sea:postject
scripts.build:sea:postject: npx postject bin/broker-linux NODE_SEA_BLOB bin/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && chmod -w bin/broker-linux
scripts.release: npm run tar && npm run zip
scripts.tar: npm run tar:linux && npm run tar:alpine && npm run tar:mac && npm run tar:win
scripts.tar:linux: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|broker-linux|broker|' -czvf rel/broker-linux-x86.tar.gz broker-linux
scripts.tar:alpine: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|broker-alpine|broker|' -czvf rel/broker-alpine-x86.tar.gz broker-alpine
scripts.tar:mac: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|broker-macos|broker|' -czvf rel/broker-mac-x86.tar.gz broker-macos
scripts.tar:win: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|broker-win|broker|' -czvf rel/broker-win-x86.tar.gz broker-win.exe
scripts.zip: npm run zip:linux && npm run zip:alpine && npm run zip:mac && npm run zip:win
scripts.zip:linux:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/broker-linux-x86.zip bin/broker-linux -j bin && printf '@ broker-linux
@=broker
' | zipnote -w rel/broker-linux-x86.zip
scripts.zip:alpine:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/broker-alpine-x86.zip bin/broker-alpine -j bin && printf '@ broker-alpine
@=broker
' | zipnote -w rel/broker-alpine-x86.zip
scripts.zip:mac:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/broker-mac-x86.zip bin/broker-macos -j bin && printf '@ broker-macos
@=broker
' | zipnote -w rel/broker-mac-x86.zip
scripts.zip:win:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/broker-win-x86.zip bin/broker-win.exe -j bin && printf '@ broker-win.exe
@=broker.exe
' | zipnote -w rel/broker-win-x86.zip
